verses.verse: After this, I will pour out my Spirit on all mankind. Your sons and your daughters will prophesy; your old men shall dream dreams, and your young men shall see visions.
Even on the male and female slaves I will pour out my Spirit in those days.
I will show portents in the heavens and on the earth, blood and fire and columns of smoke.
The sun will be turned to darkness and the moon to blood before the coming of the day of the LORD, that great and terrible day.
Then everyone will be saved who calls on the name of the LORD. For on Mount Zion there will be a remnant, as the LORD has said, and in Jerusalem there will be survivors whom the LORD will call.
